translation.en: "Childhood is not from birth to a certain age."
translation.es: La infancia no es desde que se nace hasta cierta edad.

translation.en: "And at a certain age, the child is grown and puts away childish things."
translation.es: Y a cierta edad, el niño ha crecido y deja atrás cosas infantiles.

translation.en: "Childhood is the kingdom where nobody dies."
translation.es: La infancia es el reino en el que nadie muere.

translation.en: You just have to break them in.
I've been breaking them in. For three days.
translation.es: Los he estado ablandando por tres días.

translation.en: Just thinking it's a little much, you know?
Where do you want them, boss?
On either side of the aisle.
translation.es: En cualquiera de los lados del pasillo.

translation.en: - What aisle? - Does no one have vision?
translation.es: -¿Qué pasillo? -¿Nadie tiene un poco de imaginación?

translation.en: You, go home and get lots of beauty sleep.
translation.es: Tú, vete a casa y duerme bien.

translation.en: l was just checking for cold feet.

translation.es: No, eso nunca va a pasar.

translation.en: It's not too late to change your mind.
What? Now you're having second thoughts?
No, I've been waiting a century to marry you, Miss Swan.
translation.es: No, he esperado un siglo para casarme contigo.

translation.en: l haven't told you everything about myself.
translation.es: No te he dicho todo sobre mí.

translation.en: Look, you can't scare me away now.
Look, a few years after Carlisle created me...
translation.es: Unos años después de que Carlisle me creó,

translation.en: l resented him for curbing my appetite.
translation.es: Me molestaba que controlara mi apetito.

translation.en: And so for a while, l went off on my own.
translation.es: Y por un tiempo me fui por mi cuenta.

translation.en: l wanted to know how it felt to hunt.
translation.es: Quería saber lo que era cazar.

translation.en: You probably saved more lives than you took.
translation.es: Probablemente salvaste más vidas de las que tomaste.

translation.en: Bella, that's what l told myself.
translation.es: Es lo que me decía a mí mismo.

translation.en: But they were all human beings.
l looked into their eyes as they died and l saw who l was...
translation.es: Los miraba a los ojos mientras morían y podía ver quién era yo,
y de lo que era capaz.

translation.en: And what I'll be capable of.
translation.es: De lo que yo seré capaz.

translation.en: Why are you telling me this tonight?
Did you really think this was going to change my mind about you?
translation.es: ¿Creíste que haría cambiar mi opinión sobre ti?

translation.en: l just wondered if it would change your mind about yourself...
translation.es: Pensé que podría cambiar tu opinión sobre ti misma,

translation.en: ...and who you want to see when you look in the mirror a year from now.
translation.es: y de quién quieres ver cuando te mires en el espejo de aquí a un año.

translation.en: l know l can do this.
You should give yourself some credit for that.
Now, hopefully, a year from now...
translation.es: Espero que de aquí a un año,

translation.en: ...I am going to look in the mirror and see someone like you.
translation.es: me mire al espejo y vea a alguien como tú.

translation.en: l mean, someone capable of courage and sacrifice and love.
translation.es: Alguien capaz de ser valiente, de sacrificarse y... de amar.

translation.en: - Come on! Let's go! - I am late for my bachelor party.
Send him out, Bella, or we're coming in after him.
translation.es: Déjalo ir, Bella, o entraré a buscarlo.

translation.en: No, just a couple of mountain lions. Maybe a few bears.
translation.es: No, sólo un par de pumas. Tal vez unos cuantos osos.

translation.en: Don't worry, Bella, we'll give him back in plenty of time.
translation.es: No te preocupes, va a regresar a tiempo.

translation.en: Ok, go, before they break my house.
translation.es: Vete ya, antes de que destruyan mi casa.

translation.en: I'll meet you at the altar.
I'll be the one in white.
What did l say about beauty sleep?

translation.es: Lo siento. Tuve un mal sueño.

translation.en: Please. I am not offended by your choice of groom.
translation.es: Por favor. No me ofende tu elección de novio.

translation.en: Just my blatant lack of respect for mortality.
translation.es: Sólo mi total falta de respeto por la mortalidad.

translation.en: Hey, so, did you find our daughter?
You sure? l don't want to...
We thought you needed something blue.

translation.es: Aparte de tu madre. Qué amable.

translation.en: - lt was Grandmother Swan's. - But we added the sapphires.
translation.es: Era de la abuela Swan. Pero añadimos los zafiros.

translation.en: Pass on to your daughter, and her daughter.
translation.es: Pasará a tu hija, y a su hija.
No, no estropearás mi obra de arte.

translation.en: Do you want to see it? l want to see it!
They have got to be related.
So, you think Bella's going to be showing?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿crees que a Bella se le note?

translation.en: Ok. Who else gets married at 18?
translation.es: Claro. ¿Quién más se casa a los 18?

translation.en: Just don't let me fall, Dad.
Ladies and gentlemen, we are gathered here on this glorious day...
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, estamos reunidos aquí en este glorioso día

translation.en: ...to witness the union of Edward Cullen and Bella Swan.
translation.es: para presenciar la unión de Edward Cullen y Bella Swan.
Te tomo a ti, Bella Swan.

translation.en: -Take you, Bella Swan. -To have and to hold.
translation.es: Te tomo a ti, Bella Swan... Para amarte siempre...
En las buenas y en las malas.
En la riqueza y la pobreza.
En la salud y en la enfermedad.

translation.en: As long as we both shall live.
translation.es: Por el resto de nuestros días.

translation.en: Just thought it'd be bigger. Yeah.
We were just saying how pretty everything is, you know, just saying.
translation.es: Hola, chicos. Estábamos hablando sobre lo lindo que está todo.

translation.en: Well, thanks so much. You don't think it's too much?
translation.es: Muchas gracias. ¿No creen que es demasiado?

translation.en: - I am happy for you. - Thank you.
l hope you'll be happy, Bella.
I am sure Jake wishes you the best.
translation.es: Estoy seguro de que Jake te desea lo mejor.

translation.en: Well, l plan on getting drunk.
They're serving up some pretty fancy champagne.
Sue, can l get you a glass?
Yes, and these are our cousins from Alaska.
translation.es: Sí, y ellas son nuestras primas de Alaska. Tanya. Kate.

translation.en: - Tanya, Kate. - We've heard so much about you.
- l can't do this. - You promised.
translation.es: No puedo hacer esto. Lo prometiste.

translation.en: He wanted to be like us.
To live in peace with humans.
translation.es: vivir en paz con los humanos.

translation.en: Let's not monopolize the bride. Congratulations.
translation.es: No abrumemos a la novia. Felicidades.

translation.en: Well, what's a wedding without some family drama?
translation.es: -¿Qué es una boda sin dramas familiares? -Sí.

translation.en: Umm, I'd like to propose a toast.
Bella, I hope you've gotten enough sleep these last 18 years.
translation.es: Bella, espero que hayas dormido bien estos 18 años,

translation.en: Because you won't be getting any more for a while.
translation.es: porque no dormirás por un tiempo.

translation.en: Well, Bella was just like everybody else, totally mesmerized by Edward.
translation.es: Bueno, Bella era como todas nosotras, totalmente cautivada por Edward,

translation.en: Or "The Hair," as l call him.
translation.es: o El galán, como yo lo llamo.
Entonces, de pronto, Edward sólo... quiere ver a Bella.

translation.en: Even though she's not the captain of the volleyball team.
translation.es: Aunque ni siquiera es la capitana del equipo de voleibol.

translation.en: I am just kidding. I am just kidding.
Or the president of the student council.
Edward will be a good husband.
I know this because I am a cop.
Like how to hunt somebody to the ends of the Earth.
translation.es: Como perseguir a alguien hasta el fin del mundo.

translation.en: ...you'll have to get over your aversion to fashion.
translation.es: tendrás que olvidar tu aversión a la moda.

translation.en: And I know how to use a gun.
I'd like to thank Renne and Charlie...
translation.es: Quiero agradecer a Renee y a Charlie

translation.en: ...for bringing such a wonderful person into the world and into our lives.
translation.es: por traer a una persona tan maravillosa al mundo. Y a nuestras vidas.

translation.en: We will cherish and protect her forever.
translation.es: Siempre la vamos a querer y proteger.

translation.en: ...to meet someone who you can bare your soul to.
translation.es: conocer a alguien... con quien puedes compartirlo todo.

translation.en: And who will accept you for what you are.
translation.es: Que te acepta tal como eres.

translation.en: I've been waiting, what seems like a very long time...
translation.es: He estado esperando por mucho tiempo...
a sobreponerme a lo que soy.

translation.en: ...I feel like I can finally begin.
translation.es: siento que por fin puedo hacerlo.

translation.en: So I'd like to propose a toast to my beautiful bride.
translation.es: Así que propongo un brindis por mi hermosa esposa.

translation.en: No measure of time with you will be long enough.
translation.es: Ninguna medida de tiempo contigo... será suficiente.

translation.en: Another one of your gifts just arrived.
translation.es: Acaba de llegar otro de tus regalos.

translation.en: What's a wedding present doing out here?
translation.es: ¿Por qué un regalo de bodas aquí afuera?

translation.en: The best man didn't have time to get a tux.
translation.es: No tuve tiempo de ponerme un traje.

translation.en: I'll see if Rosalie wants to dance.
I am sorry I am late.
We were going to put your face on a milk carton.
translation.es: Te íbamos a reportar como desaparecido.
Más que nada al norte de Canadá.

translation.en: It's weird to be back on two legs again, in clothes.
translation.es: Es raro caminar en dos piernas otra vez. Usar ropa.

translation.en: Gotten out of practice with the whole human thing.
translation.es: Había perdido el hábito de ser un humano.

translation.en: Why? Afraid I'll trash your party?
You'd think I'd be used to telling you goodbye by now.
translation.es: Ya debería estar acostumbrado a despedirme de ti.

translation.en: Come on, you're not supposed to be the one crying, Bella.
translation.es: Vamos, no quiero que llores en tu boda.

translation.en: This is how I am going to remember you.
translation.es: Así es como te voy a recordar.

translation.en: Because what, soon I am going to be dead to you?
I am just trying to appreciate your last night as a human.
translation.es: Quiero aprovechar tu última noche como humana.

translation.en: Well, it's not my last night.
l didn't really want to spend my honeymoon writhing in pain.
translation.es: No quería pasar mi luna de miel retorciéndome de dolor.

translation.en: It's not like you're goin to have a real honeymoon with him, anyway.
translation.es: No es que vaya a ser una verdadera luna de miel.

translation.en: It's going to be as real as anyone else's.
translation.es: Va a ser tan real como cualquier otra.

translation.en: You can't be serious, Bella. Tell me you're not that stupid.
translation.es: No hablas en serio, Bella. Dime que no eres tan estúpida.

translation.en: l mean, it's really none of your business.
translation.es: La verdad es que no es asunto tuyo.

translation.en: - No! You can't do this! - Jake.
- Listen to me, Bella. - Jake, let me go!
Are you out of your mind? Huh? You'll kill her!
You're not going to start something that we'll have to finish.
translation.es: No empezarás algo que tendríamos que terminar.

translation.en: I am really, really, really stupid.
Come on, people are probably missing us. Let's go back.
So, he really won't tell you where he's taking you?
translation.es: ¿En serio no te dirá adónde irán?

translation.en: Everything's packed and ready to go.
- I am going to see him. - Yeah.
It's going to be strange for me, too.
You know it will always be your home, right?
translation.es: Sabes que siempre será tu casa.

translation.en: l always have and l always will.
translation.es: Siempre te quise y siempre te querré.

translation.en: Go on. You don't want to miss your plane.
translation.es: Anda. No puedes perder tu avión.

translation.en: So, we're not staying in Rio?
lt was a gift from Carlisle.
l am nothing if not traditional.
You want to take a look around?
Do you want to go for a swim?
l could use a few human minutes.
Don't take too long, Mrs. Cullen.
Bella, l can't tell you how sorry l am.
Really, I am not. I am fine. Don't say you're fine.
translation.es: -En serio, estoy bien. -No, no digas que estás bien.

translation.en: Why can't you see how perfectly happy l am?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no ves lo perfectamente feliz que soy?
O lo era hace cinco segundos.

translation.en: l mean, now I am sort of pissed off, actually.
translation.es: Ahora sí estoy un poco molesta.

translation.en: You should be angry with me.
l mean, we knew this was going to be tricky, right?
l mean, it was amazing for me.
l know it's not the same for you...
translation.es: Sé que no es lo mismo para ti,

translation.en: ...but for a human, l can't imagine that it gets any better than that.
translation.es: pero para un humano, dudo que haya algo mejor que eso.

translation.en: ...was the best night of my existence.
translation.es: fue la mejor noche de mi existencia.

translation.en: You're not going to touch me again, are you?
translation.es: Supongo que no me volverás a tocar.

translation.en: You know that's not what l mean.
translation.es: Sabes que no me refiero a eso.

translation.en: lt was a really good dream.
Because l wanted it to be real.
Maybe they'll say she was in a car crash.
translation.es: Quizá digan que fue un accidente de auto,

translation.en: Or tripped and fell off a cliff.
translation.es: o que tropezó y se cayó de un arrecife.

translation.en: Keep it in play! Keep it in play!
At least I'll get one thing out of it.
translation.es: Al menos sacaré algo bueno de esto.

translation.en: Cullens are not a danger to the town or the tribe.
translation.es: Los Cullen no son un peligro para el pueblo o la tribu.

translation.en: Well, he's either going to kill her or change her.
translation.es: Pues la matará o la convertirá. Y el tratado dice...

translation.en: - And the treaty says-- - l say, Jacob.
translation.es: Pues la matará o la convertirá. Y el tratado dice... Lo digo yo, Jacob.

translation.en: You know, if you wanted things different, you should've become alpha.
translation.es: ¡Dale! Si querías cambiar las cosasdebiste hacerte Alfa.

translation.en: Turning it down seemed like a good idea at the time.
translation.es: Rehusarme parecía una buena idea en aquel momento.

translation.en: Jake, you really think you could kill Bella if she comes back a vampire?
translation.es: Jake, ¿crees que podrías matar a Bella si regresa como vampiro?

translation.en: No, make one of us do it, then hold a grudge against us.
translation.es: No. Nos pediría hacerlo y luego nos guardaría rencor.

translation.en: Would you just get over it? It's not like you've imprinted on her.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no la olvidas? ¿O es que te imprimaste de ella?

translation.en: Yeah, some people are just lucky, l guess.
translation.es: Sí, creo que algunos tienen suerte.

translation.en: None of them belong to themselves anymore.
translation.es: Ya ninguno de ellos pertenece a sí mismo.

translation.en: And the sickest part is their genes tell them they're happy about it.
translation.es: Y lo que es peor, sus genes les dicen que así son felices.

translation.en: Least if you imprinted on someone, you'd finally forget about Bella.
translation.es: Si te imprimaras de alguien por fin te olvidarías de Bella.

translation.en: l mean, being any kind of happy is better than being miserable...
translation.es: Quiero decir, tener algo de felicidad es mejor que ser infeliz por alguien que no puedes tener.
que ser infeliz por alguien que no puedes tener.

translation.en: Bella, these are our housekeepers, Gustavo and Kaure.
translation.es: Bella, ellos cuidan de la casa: Gustavo y Kaure.

translation.en: Well, l guess we just leave them to it.
translation.es: Mejor que vayan a hacer lo suyo.

translation.en: Because l have you here all alone.
You mean she knows about you?
She's native Ticuna. They have legends about blood-drinking demons...
translation.es: Es una Ticuna. Tienen leyendas de demonios chupasangre que persiguen mujeres hermosas.
de demonios chupasangre que persiguen mujeres hermosas.

translation.en: You don't need to see this.

translation.es: En la salud y en la enfermedad, ¿recuerdas?

translation.en: lt must have been the chicken.
How many days has it been since the wedding?
translation.es: ¿Hace cuántos días que fue la boda? Catorce, ¿por qué?

translation.en: Will you tell me what's going on?
- Here's Carlisle. - Bella, what's going on?
l don't know. I am a little worried. Can vampires go into shock?
translation.es: No sé. Estoy preocupada. ¿Puede un vampiro estar en shock?

translation.en: l know that it's impossible, but l think that I am pregnant.
translation.es: Sé que es imposible, pero... creo que estoy embarazada.

translation.en: Carlisle, l swear, something just moved inside me.
translation.es: Carlisle, te juro que algo se movió dentro de mí.

translation.en: - ls this even possible? - I don't know.
The sooner Bella's here, the sooner we can find out what it is.
translation.es: Trae a Bella lo más pronto posible para averiguar lo que sucede.

translation.en: I need you to get to the mainland at once. Yeah, yeah, l will.
Kaure's making sure you're still alive.
translation.es: Kaure quiere asegurarse de que estás viva.

translation.en: What did you do with her?
What do you know about this?
l know that you are a demon!
Her people have legends. She might have seen this before.
translation.es: Su gente tiene leyendas. Quizás ya haya visto esto.

translation.en: Tell me how to help her.
Tell me how she can survive this.
translation.es: Dime qué hacer para que sobreviva a esto.

translation.en: I am not going to let it hurt you.
Carlisle will get that thing out.
- What's going on? - l need your help.
Hey, haven't seen you in a while.
translation.es: Hola. Hace tiempo que no te veo.

translation.en: - You ok? - So, you finally heard from Bella?
translation.es: ¿Estás bien? ¿Al fin supo algo de Bella?

translation.en: They want to wait until she feels better before they travel.
translation.es: Quieren esperar a que se sienta mejor antes de viajar.

translation.en: Yeah, she told me not to worry, but she sounded...
translation.es: Dijo que no me preocupara, pero sonaba...

translation.en: Listen, just give it to me straight.
-She's here? -They came home two weeks ago.

translation.es: No tan cerca. ¿Cuál es el problema?

translation.en: Yeah, it's nice to see you, too.
translation.es: Sí. También me da gusto verte.

translation.en: So, are you going to tell me what's wrong with you?
Rose, you want to help me up?
We didn't know it was even possible.
- What is it? - I am not sure.
translation.es: ¿Qué es? No estoy seguro. El ultrasonido no penetra el saco embrionario.

translation.en: Ultrasounds and needles won't penetrate the embryonic sac.
translation.es: No estoy seguro. El ultrasonido no penetra el saco embrionario.

translation.en: And l can't see Bella's future anymore.
translation.es: Y ya no logro ver el futuro de Bella.

translation.en: We've been researching legends, but there isn't much to go on.
translation.es: Hemos estado investigando leyendas, pero no hay mucho que ayude.

translation.en: What we do know is that it's strong. And fast-growing.
translation.es: Sólo sabemos que crece rápido y que es muy fuerte.

translation.en: Why haven't you done anything? Take it out of her!
translation.es: ¿Por qué no han hecho nada? ¡Sáquenselo de adentro!

translation.en: This is none of your business, dog.
translation.es: Esto no es asunto tuyo, perro.

translation.en: All this fighting isn't good for Bella.
The fetus isn't good for Bella.
translation.es: El feto es el que daña a Bella.

translation.en: Say the word, Alice. "Baby." It's just a little baby.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no dices lo que es? Bebé. Es sólo un bebé.

translation.en: Carlisle, you've got to do something.
It's not his decision. It's not any of yours.
translation.es: No es su decisión. De ningunos de ustedes.

translation.en: Jacob, l need to talk to you.
l always knew you'd destroy her.
She thinks Carlisle can turn her at the last minute...
translation.es: Cree que Carlisle puede convertirla en el último momento.

translation.en: ...like he did for me and Esme.
Look, Jacob, l need you to do something for me.
translation.es: Jacob, tienes que hacer algo por mí.

translation.en: You have a connection with her that I'll never understand.
translation.es: Tienes una conexión con ella que nunca entenderé.

translation.en: Maybe you could talk to her, change her mind.
translation.es: Tal vez si tú le hablaras, la convencerías.

translation.en: - So, Edward sent you in here to talk to me? - Sort of.
translation.es: ¿Edward te mandó a que hablaras conmigo? Más o menos.

translation.en: Though l can't figure out why he thinks you'd listen to me.
translation.es: Aunque no sé por qué cree que me harás caso a mí.

translation.en: l mean, you never have before.
Since when are you and blondie BFFs?
translation.es: ¿Desde cuándo son amigas tú y la rubia?

translation.en: l know this seems like a scary thing...
translation.es: Sé que es algo intimidante, pero...

translation.en: It's like this miracle or something.
translation.es: Esto es una especie de milagro.

translation.en: So, it's a bouncing baby boy.
translation.es: Así que va a ser un varoncito.

translation.en: I am sorry l didn't know. Should've brought some blue balloons.
translation.es: Lástima que no lo supe. Habría traído globos azules.

translation.en: When l picture him, l see a boy.
translation.es: Cuando lo imagino, veo un niño.

translation.en: - I am strong enough. - Come on.
You can spout that crap to your bloodsucker, but you don't fool me.
translation.es: Tú dile eso a tu chupasangre, pero a mí no me engañas.

translation.en: l can see what that thing's doing to you. It's a killer, Bella.
translation.es: Yo estoy viendo lo que esa cosa te está haciendo. Es un asesino, Bella.

translation.en: - You're wrong. - And when you die...
translation.es: No es cierto. Y si mueres, ¿qué caso tuvo?

translation.en: ...what was the point? Of me loving you, you loving him.
translation.es: Y si mueres, ¿qué caso tuvo? El que yo te ame, que tú lo ames.

translation.en: How is that right for anyone?
Because l sure don't see it.
Jake, everything's going to be ok.
And I am not sticking around to watch.
translation.es: Y no me quedaré a verlo.

translation.en: Jacob! Jake, I can do this. I can do this.
I am strong enough. I am strong enough.
This is none of your business, dog.
translation.es: Esto no es asunto tuyo, perro.

translation.en: Everything's going to be ok. The fetus isn't good for Bella.
translation.es: -Todo va a salir bien. -El feto no es bueno para Bella.

translation.en: Don't you even care that it's killing you?
translation.es: ¿No te importa que la esté matando?

translation.en: - Is it true, Jacob? - What will it be?
- Monstrosity. - An abomination. On our land.
- We can't allow it. - We can't allow it.
- We can't allow it. - We can't allow it.
We have to protect the tribe.
What they've bred won't be able to control its thirst.
translation.es: Lo que hayan procreado no podrá controlar su sed.

translation.en: Every human will be in danger.
- We're ready. - No time to waste.
We must destroy it before it's born.
translation.es: Debemos destruirlo antes de que nazca.
Su elección nos afecta a todos.

translation.en: Bella's human. Our protection applies to her.
translation.es: Bella es humana. Nuestra protección la incluye a ella.

translation.en: We have real enemies to fight tonight.
translation.es: Deberemos enfrentar verdaderos enemigos esta noche.

translation.en: You will fight with us, Jake.
I am the grandson of Ephraim Black.
translation.es: Soy el nieto de Ephraim Black.

translation.en: I am the grandson of a chief!
I wasn't born to follow you, or anyone else.
translation.es: No nací para seguirte a ti. Ni a nadie más.

translation.en: Don't worry. They're not following us.
translation.es: No te preocupes. No nos siguieron.

translation.en: What do you think you're doing here?
- l left Sam's pack. - Go home, Seth.
translation.es: -Dejé la manada de Sam. -Regresa a casa, Seth.

translation.en: - l won't stand behind him. - Oh, yes, you will.
translation.es: No lo voy a apoyar. Sí, lo harás.

translation.en: I am not kidding. Get out of here.
ls that an order? Going to make me bow down, too?
translation.es: ¿Es una orden? ¿También quieres que me doblegue a ti?

translation.en: Look, I am just going off on my own here, ok?
translation.es: Yo sólo quiero ir por mi cuenta, ¿sí?

translation.en: Great, and I've got your back.
translation.es: Bien. Yo te cubro la espalda.

translation.en: ...are you really ready to fight your own brothers?
translation.es: ¿estás dispuesto a pelear contra tus propios hermanos?

translation.en: If it's the right thing to do.
I am going to go give the Cullens a heads-up.
translation.es: Yo iré a avisar a los Cullen.

translation.en: How cool is this? Two-man pack. Two against the world.
translation.es: ¡Qué genial es esto! Una manada de dos. Dos contra el mundo.

translation.en: You're getting on my nerves, Seth.
translation.es: Me estás sacando de quicio, Seth.

translation.en: They're not going to touch her.
Man, l can smell them from all the way out here.
translation.es: Vaya, hasta acá los puedo oler.

translation.en: What the hell are you doing here?
I am not going to let my little brother get himself killed.
translation.es: No dejaré que maten a mi hermanito.

translation.en: Go away, Leah! l can take care of myself.
That you think so proves you need a babysitter.
translation.es: Decir eso prueba que debo vigilarte.

translation.en: Ok, would the both of you shut up?
Sam doesn't even know l left.
translation.es: Sam no sabe que me fui.

translation.en: l think he just figured it out.
translation.es: Creo que acaba de darse cuenta.

translation.en: l know what his plan is.
Sam's lost the element of surprise...
translation.es: Sam ya perdió el elemento sorpresa

translation.en: ...and he doesn't want to take you on outnumbered...
translation.es: y no querrá enfrentarlos si lo superan en número.

translation.en: ...so he's not going to come at you head on.
He's got the place surrounded and he'll wait for his opportunity.
translation.es: Va a rodear el lugar y esperará su oportunidad.

translation.en: We won't get through without a fight.
We won't be the ones to break the treaty.
The treaty is void, at least in Sam's mind.
translation.es: El tratado no es válido. Eso es lo que piensa Sam.

translation.en: Carlisle, no one's hunted for weeks.
translation.es: Carlisle, nadie ha cazado en semanas.

translation.en: You've done us a great service, Jacob. Thank you.
translation.es: Nos has hecho un gran favor, Jacob. Gracias.

translation.en: l know they're out there somewhere, but l can't hear them anymore.
translation.es: Sé que andan por ahí. Pero ya no puedo oírlos.

translation.en: l stopped hearing them, too, the second l decided to leave.
translation.es: Yo también dejé de oírlos. En cuanto decidí irme.

translation.en: You know you can't stay here.
- But l don't have any place... - l can't trust you with the Cullens.
translation.es: -No tengo adónde... -No confió en ti con los Cullen.

translation.en: l just have to follow you.
Look, Seth doesn't want you here. Neither do l.
translation.es: Seth no te quiere aquí. Y yo tampoco.

translation.en: Being unwanted isn't exactly a new thing for me.
translation.es: No ser bienvenida no es nada nuevo para mí.

translation.en: Look, I'll stay out of your way.
...except go back to Sam's pack and be the pathetic ex-girlfriend he can't get away from.
translation.es: Excepto volver a la manada de Sam y... ser la patética ex novia de la que no puede escapar.

translation.en: You don't know how many times l wished l could imprint on someone.
translation.es: Tú no sabes cuántas veces deseé poder imprimarme de alguien.

translation.en: I am going to do a perimeter run. You got my flank?
translation.es: Iré a hacer un recorrido. ¿Cuidas mi flanco?

translation.en: But there are no splinters. You haven't punctured anything.
translation.es: Pero no está astillada. No ha perforado nada.
Le está rompiendo los huesos ahora.

translation.en: It's crushing you from the inside out.
Carlisle, tell her what you told me. Tell her.
translation.es: Carlisle, dile lo que me dijiste. Díselo.

translation.en: Carlisle, tell me. It's all right.
The fetus isn't compatible with your body.
translation.es: El feto no es compatible con tu cuerpo.

translation.en: lt won't allow you to get the nutrition you need.
translation.es: No permitirá que recibas la nutrición necesaria.

translation.en: It's starving you by the hour. l can't stop it, and l can't slow it down.
translation.es: Te está matando de hambre, y no puedo pararlo ni retardarlo.

translation.en: At this rate, your heart will give out before you can deliver.
translation.es: A este paso, tu corazón fallará antes del parto.

translation.en: Then I'll hold on as long as l can, and then...
translation.es: Aguantaré lo más que pueda y...

translation.en: There are some conditions that even venom can't overcome.
translation.es: hay algunas condiciones que ni el veneno puede superar.

translation.en: You won't. You're going to have a part of me.
translation.es: Pero vas a tener una parte de mí.

translation.en: Do you honestly think that l could love it or even tolerate it if it killed you?
translation.es: ¿En serio crees que podría amarlo, o siquiera tolerarlo si te matara?

translation.en: You have to accept what is.
translation.es: Tienes que aceptar lo que es.

translation.en: Because you've given me no choice!
Bella, we're supposed to be partners, remember?
translation.es: Bella, íbamos a compartirlo todo. No lo olvides.

translation.en: But you decided this on your own.

translation.es: No lo veas de esa forma.

translation.en: Well, l have no other way to see it.
translation.es: Pues no tengo otra forma de verlo.

translation.en: Because it's me who'll lose you.
Smile like I am your favorite person in the world.
translation.es: Sonreír como si fuera tu persona favorita.

translation.en: Feels complete when you're here, Jake.
translation.es: Me siento completa cuando estás aquí.

translation.en: We need to find a way to get some food into her system.
translation.es: Debemos encontrar la forma de alimentarla un poco.

translation.en: - If l could only see the fetus... - The baby.
translation.es: Si pudiera ver al feto. El bebé.

translation.en: ...maybe l could figure out what it wants.
translation.es: Tal vez podría entender lo que quiere.

translation.en: lt wasn't an idea. lt was a snide comment.
translation.es: No fue una idea. Fue un comentario sarcástico.

translation.en: That it's probably just looking for someone to sink its teeth into.
translation.es: Que probablemente está buscando a quien clavarle los dientes.

translation.en: If it's craving, it's not going to want animal blood.
translation.es: Si es apetito, no va a querer sangre animal.

translation.en: l have some O negative laid aside for Bella.
translation.es: Tengo sangre O negativo reservada para Bella.

translation.en: You're going to make her drink that?
It's the fastest way to test the theory.
translation.es: Es la mejor forma de probar la teoría. Sólo si tú estás de acuerdo.

translation.en: Only if you're comfortable with it.
translation.es: Sólo si tú estás de acuerdo.

translation.en: l think I am going to be sick.
This might make it a little easier to take.
translation.es: Con esto será más fácil tomarla.

translation.en: Your pulse is already getting stronger.
- Well, you sound better. l am.
This whole thing must've put a kink in the honeymoon, huh?
translation.es: Todo esto debe haber arruinado tu luna de miel, ¿no?

translation.en: Otherwise, married life treating you ok?
translation.es: En lo demás, ¿te gusta la vida de casada?

translation.en: Edward still walks on water and all that?
translation.es: ¿Edward sigue caminando sobre las aguas y todo eso?

translation.en: Yeah, but, l mean, it is different now.
The important thing is that you're better.
translation.es: Lo importante es que estés mejor.

translation.en: And that you're coming home soon, right?
translation.es: Y que pronto estarás en casa, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Ok, Dad, l don't want you to freak out...
translation.es: Papá, no quiero que te preocupes,

translation.en: ...but I am going to a medical center in Switzerland.
translation.es: me iré a un centro médico en Suiza.

translation.en: What? No, no, you're not. You're not going to Switzerland. What are you... You said you were better.
translation.es: ¿Qué? No, no te irás a Suiza. Dijiste que estabas mejor.

translation.en: No, Bella. I am getting on a plane. No.
It's really more of a spa.
translation.es: No, es más bien como... un spa.

translation.en: And I am sure that I'd be better by the time you got there anyway.
translation.es: Y seguro ya estaría mejor para cuando tú llegaras.

translation.en: ...like I am sitting on the couch with you, eating pizza or something.
translation.es: Como si estuviera ahí sentada comiendo pizza o algo.

translation.en: Dad, l got to go, ok?
I am sorry I've been so angry.
I've left you alone in this.
translation.es: Te he dejado sola en esto.

translation.en: Well, they say the first year is the hardest.
translation.es: Dicen que el primer año es el más duro.

translation.en: He likes the sound of your voice.
translation.es: Le gusta el sonido de tu voz.

translation.en: He likes my voice as well.
l thought he was like me, but he's not. He's like you.
translation.es: Creí que era como yo, pero no. Es como tú.

translation.en: Of course you're happy. How could you not be?
translation.es: Claro que estás feliz. ¿Cómo no ibas a estarlo?

translation.en: So, that's the last of it?
Bella could deliver as early as tomorrow.
translation.es: Bella podría dar a luz mañana.

translation.en: If she's going to have any chance at all, she'll need more blood.
translation.es: Para poder sobrevivir necesitará más sangre.

translation.en: You have to be at your strongest for her. We need to go tonight.
translation.es: Debes estar fuerte para ella. Iremos esta noche.
Carlisle, ahora tú eres el enemigo.

translation.en: Sam won't hesitate. You will be slaughtered.
translation.es: Sam no lo dudará, los matará a todos.

translation.en: - That won't be enough. - We have no choice, Jacob.
If there's anything we can do to save her, we have to try.
translation.es: Si algo podemos hacer para salvarla, lo intentaremos.

translation.en: - You'd risk your lives for her? - Of course we would.
translation.es: ¿Arriesgarían la vida por ella? Por supuesto que sí. Bella es parte de la familia ahora.

translation.en: Bella's a part of our family now.
translation.es: Por supuesto que sí. Bella es parte de la familia ahora.

translation.en: As strong as the one l was born into.
translation.es: Tan fuerte como aquella en la que yo nací.

translation.en: l know what l have to do.
translation.es: Yo sé lo que debo hacer.

translation.en: We should phase, Jacob. We can't protect ourselves like this.
translation.es: Debemos transformarnos. No podemos protegernos así.

translation.en: They'll see it as a threat.
Be easier if l could hear you, too.
translation.es: Sería más fácil si también pudiera oírlos.
Éste ya no es tu territorio.

translation.en: - How's the new family working out? - You done?
l want Sam to take back Leah and Seth.
translation.es: Quiero que Leah y a Seth regresen con Sam.

translation.en: l need Sam to wait until Bella's been separated from the problem.
translation.es: Quiero que Sam espere a que Bella ya no sea parte del problema.

translation.en: Tell Sam that when the moment comes, I'll be the one to destroy it.
translation.es: Dile a Sam que cuando llegue el momento, yo seré el que lo destruya.

translation.en: I am the only one who can.
Can't we come up with something just a little more classic?
translation.es: ¿No podemos pensar en algo un poco más tradicional?

translation.en: Yeah, it's not like I am the one carrying a demon.
translation.es: Sí, no soy yo el que trae un demonio dentro.

translation.en: Why don't you tell Jacob what you've decided?
translation.es: Dile a Jacob lo que decidiste.

translation.en: Rose is trying to talk Bella out of her baby names.
translation.es: A Rose no le gustan los nombres que eligió Bella.

translation.en: Well, then I am on your side no matter what you picked.
translation.es: Pues yo aceptaré el nombre que tú le quieras poner.

translation.en: Ok, fine, that one's not awful.
Why don't you tell him the girl's name?
translation.es: Ahora diles el de la niña.

translation.en: l was playing around with our moms' names.
translation.es: Quiero formar algo con los nombres de nuestras mamás.

translation.en: And it's unique, which certainly fits the situation.
translation.es: Y es original. Le va bien a la situación.

translation.en: Carlisle said the placenta must have detached.
translation.es: Carlisle dice que la placenta se ha desprendido.

translation.en: - He's coming as fast as he can, but... - We'll have to do it.
translation.es: Vendrá lo más rápido que pueda. Tendremos que hacerlo nosotros.
No hay tiempo. Se está muriendo.

translation.en: Alice, get her out of here!
Ow! Save her! You've got to change her!
l can't, not whilst he's still in there. l got to get him out first.
translation.es: No puedo. Tengo que sacarlo a él primero.

translation.en: Stay, Bella. Stay focused. Keep your heart beating.
translation.es: Sé fuerte, Bella. Haz que siga latiendo tu corazón.

translation.en: l promise I am ok. Let me.
translation.es: Te prometo que estoy bien. Dámela.

translation.en: You deserve to live with this.
You're not dead. You're not dead.
No, it will work. lt will work.
Come back to me, please, baby.
translation.es: Vuelve a mí, por favor, mi amor.

translation.en: l don't care what he's done.
translation.es: No me importa lo que haya hecho.

translation.en: - He's still my son. - I am sorry, Billy.
translation.es: Sigue siendo mi hijo. Lo siento, Billy.

translation.en: l just thought you should know.
Suddenly, it's not the Earth holding you here.
translation.es: De pronto, no es la tierra la que te sujeta.

translation.en: You would do anything, be anything she needs.
translation.es: Harías cualquier cosa. Serías cualquier cosa que ella necesitara.

translation.en: You're going to be all right.
l won't let them hurt my family.
If you kill her, you kill me.
translation.es: Si la matan, me matan a mí.

translation.en: Whoever a wolf imprints on can't be harmed.
translation.es: Si un lobo se imprimó de ella, no pueden lastimarla.

translation.en: - Maybe l was too late. - No, Edward.
translation.es: Quizás me demoré demasiado. No, Edward.

translation.en: Which is spelt with an "S," Sweet Bianca.
translation.es: Que se escribe con una S, dulce Bianca.

translation.en: He's added a new member to his coven.
translation.es: Añadió un nuevo miembro a su grupo.

translation.en: At least our dispute with the Cullens is over.
translation.es: Al menos nuestra disputa con los Cullen se acabó.

translation.en: Our dispute goes far beyond the fate of a mere human.
translation.es: Nuestra disputa va más allá que el destino de una simple humana.

translation.en: Why, brother, l thought you understood.
translation.es: Hermano, pensé que lo habías entendido.
